chunk:
Paavani Ayurveda Vata Cleanser & Mask (2020 formulation)

Brand: Paavani Ayurveda

Category: Mask

Ingredients: RHASSOUL CLAY, OAT FLOUR*, DRY MILK*, ASHWAGANDHA*, HARITAKI*, LICORICE*, NUTMEG*, LAVENDER* & ESSENTIAL OIL OF GERANIUM*

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Canc
